content.title: Popliteal Artery Access (Retrograde)
content.description: Retrograde access via the popliteal artery for recanalization of SFA occlusions when antegrade approach has failed.
key_steps: Confirm relation to vein (artery typically deeper)
content.advantages: Allows bidirectional approach to complex lesions
content.closure: Manual compression, Gelfoam/vascular closure device off-label
